title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Saturday, August 12 (game #565)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: See Bose's next earbuds and headphones from every angle in leaked images
description: Marketing photographs reveal a new volume slider and physical buttons on the upcoming QuietComfort Ultra headphones.

title: Gothic 1 Remake new trailer shows glorious in-engine footage of the Old Camp
description: Gothic 1 Remake just got a new trailer, but unfortunately, it's still not been given a release date.

title: Outcast - A New Beginning gets new trailer showing its gorgeous open world
description: Outcast - A New Beginning just got a new trailer during the THQ Nordic 2023 Digital Showcase.

title: Space for Sale gets new trailer, fans can sign up for beta now
description: Space for Sale - the alien real estate game from Mirage Game Studios - just got a new trailer, as well as a closed beta.

title: Action RPG series Titan Quest returns with a sequel announced by THQ Nordic
description: Titan Quest 2 has been revealed by THQ Nordic with a Greek mythology-infused cinematic trailer.

title: Future Android tech may let you transfer phone calls across multiple devices
description: Google's new Link Your Device tool for Android might also introduce easier way to setup a mobile hotspot.

title: AMD's answer to Nvidia's Frame Gen graphics may be coming in September
description: A new report reveals that AMD may be ready to challenge Nvidia's Frame Gen tech with its own Fluid Motion Frames tech.

title: YouTube-ripping site finally goes dark following court-ordered ban
description: Youtube-dl site no longer loads and cannot even be accessed using a VPN - here's all we know.

title: Keith David will step into the role of Destiny 2's Commander Zavala
description: Keith David will be voicing Destiny's Commander Zavala following the passing of Lance Reddick.

title: Microsoft is taking its security protection to multicloud
description: Improvements to Microsoft Defender for Cloud see it extending protection further than its own platform.

title: Star Wars: Ahsoka was partly inspired by Lord of the Rings' best wizard
description: Star Wars' next Disney Plus series took a fascinating cue from Lord of the Rings for its lead character.

title: Chrome's new weekly security updates could beat the hackers and save your data
description: Google is accelerating Chrome updates to be weekly to reduce vulnerabilities that can be exploited by attackers

title: Microsoft OneDrive could pose a serious security threat to your business
description: New reports claim top cloud storage app Microsoft OneDrive could be hijacked and used in ransomware attacks.

title: TiVo is coming to smart TVs next year and I think it's a threat to Roku, Google and Fire TVs
description: Xperi is bringing the TiVo OS to Europe next year, with Sharp being its first named partner.

title: CISA outlines guidance to prevent big tech being hacked again so easily
description: Teenager Lapsus$ attackers managed to breach industry titans with well-known tactics, so CISA suggests some new approaches.

title: The fifth Android 14 beta has now launched, and it's probably the final one
description: The fifth Android 14 beta has landed, and this will probably be the last one before the finished release.

title: Raspberry Pi hack turns Game Boy into a ChatGPT-powered fortune teller – and I’m terrified
description: What does your future hold? DIY Raspberry Pi meets Game Boy meets ChatGPT coin-op will tell you.

title: Heart of Stone director wants a sequel – but its Rotten Tomatoes score suggests that won't happen
description: Heart of Stone's director believes the Netflix movie deserves a sequel, but its poor reception means one isn't likely.

title: EA Sports FC Mobile revealed, limited beta available now
description: EA Sports FC Mobile is releasing in September, with a limited beta available now.

title: Sonos admits that the Arc has a Dolby Atmos issue but their solution is not great
description: There's a problem with some Dolby Atmos signals that's causing unwanted artifacts on the Sonos Arc.

title: You’ve only got a month to finish any Fitbit Guided Programs before you’ll lose them
description: The Fitbit app is getting an overhaul, and in the process it will be losing Guided Programs.

title: Hisense launches a ridiculously cheap mini-LED that should make Samsung worried
description: Hisense has unveiled its TV range for 2023, which includes some super-cheap mini-LED models.

title: Microsoft Teams is fixing one of its worst mobile flaws
description: Update will make joining a Microsoft Teams call via a mobile device much simpler.

title: 6 new features that are coming to AirPods Pro 2, thanks to iOS 17
description: iOS 17 is bringing new functionality to AirPods – mostly for the AirPods Pro 2, but there are a few perks here for all AirPods.

title: Alan Wake 2 will be 'more claustrophobic' with 'physical and dangerous' enemies
description: Alan Wake 2 devs took 'references' from the Resident Evil series for the ultimate horror.

title: OnePlus just fixed a phone screen problem not even Apple or Samsung have solved
description: The OnePlus Ace 2 Pro has 24GB of RAM and a screen you can use properly in the rain.

title: Amazon is tracking and punishing employees who work from home too much
description: Amazon employees who fail to show their face three days per week at the office are now being picked out.

title: Threads update adds 3 useful features but doesn't go far enough
description: Threads' latest feature drop is a solid step forward, but it doesn't go far enough to making it feel like a true Twitter rival.

title: DJI Mini 4 Pro cleared for take-off as Skydio sunsets its rival drones
description: Another DJI Mini 4 Pro leak points to a possible release date for the drone, just as Skydio drops its consumer drone range.

title: LG finally clarifies whether its warranty covers OLED burn-in on gaming monitors – and it’s good news
description: Worried about burn-in with your PC monitor? LG has got your back with its two-year warranty coverage.

title: Beyond copy and paste: Microsoft set to debut Bing Chat feature to help transform your writing
description: Soon you’ll be able to ask Bing Chat to help you reword your text and possibly enhance your writing, as discovered in a preview of a future update.

title: The Quake 2 remaster has arrived to kick off Quakecon 2023
description: The Quake 2 remaster is out now for consoles and PC and includes a brand-new expansion.

title: Google’s new security tool wants to keep governments across the globe safe
description: Google Chronicle CyberShield aims to boost cybersecurity measures for government customers while harnessing collaboration.

title: PS5 price cut was a success everywhere except the UK, according to Sony
description: Gamers worldwide had an appetite for Sony's recent PS5 price drop, but apparently not in the UK.

title: PS5 players will benefit from Baldur's Gate 3's PC fixes
description: Baldur's Gate 3 fans have been reassured that all of the updates for the PC version of the game will also be coming to the PS5 release.

title: Oracle has shrunk its on-premise cloud offering down to a single rack
description: Configure up to 6,624 cores and 3.4 PB of storage on a three-rack system, but just pay Oracle for what you need.

title: Your Android phone can now detect unwanted AirTags – here’s how to set it up
description: The new security feature will be housed in your Android's Settings menu and activating it is easy.
